rationale: 'severe issue' describes impact/outcome. 'severe' is not intensified here.
statement_text: The virus was able to reach receptor sites and cells deeper in the respiratory tract and cause human infection. The virus was able to reach receptor sites and cells deeper in the respiratory tract and cause human infection. And it [the human infection] was obviously a severe issue.
